ratings.question_text: Your level of engagement with the course was:
What is your overall assessment of this course?
The course was well organized to facilitate student learning.
I received clear feedback that improved my learning.
Relative to other courses you have taken at Yale, the level of intellectual challenge of this course was:
Relative to other courses you have taken at Yale, the workload of this course was:

narratives.question_text: What knowledge, skills, and insights did you develop by taking this course?
comments: To be curious and do not assume or take in any statement for granted.
I learned many new skills, and new knowledge specific to chemistry, such as how to balance nuclear decay equations or electrochemistry. Furthermore, my research skill also improved greatly.
Chemistry, in the context of sustainability issues

In this course, I learned about molecular and atomic structure, energy and other knowledge, which helped me to have a deeper understanding of the nature of chemistry and the importance of environmental protection. In the teacher's vivid class, I learned the standardized writing test format, learned the secrets of chemistry. In this summer school, I was more clear about my major direction and deepened my love for chemistry.

narratives.question_text: What are the strengths and weaknesses of this course and how could it be improved?
comments: The strengths of this course is that it was clear and easy to follow. It was also highly engaging and educational. The only weakness I can think off is not being able to do the experiments in person in a lab this would of have added an extra layer to the course.

In the course of this course, the teacher showed me a lot of experiments, so that we could understand these knowledge more clearly. Putting knowledge into practice can not only deepen the impression but also make the class more interesting. In addition, when the teacher tells about Lewis Structure and some calculation problems, he will write the steps on the whiteboard, so that we can completely follow the teacher's thinking and deepen the impression. And in the process of continuous practice in the following completely master the steps and methods of these questions. In addition, when we have questions to ask the teacher, the teacher will give very clear feedback, and set aside time at the end of each class for you to answer questions, so that the class problems can be solved in time.

narratives.question_text: Would you recommend this course to another student? Please explain.
comments: Yes definitely, because it teaches you all the basic fundamentals and more. If any student wants to do something that is remotely chemistry-related there is at least one part of this course that will be relevant for them.
Yes, it was easier than your typical intro chemistry course with a lot of real-world application to keep things interesting.

I would certainly highly recommend this course to others. Because the teacher in this course is very interesting and lively, there are a lot of rich experiments and explanations. With the teacher's clear narration, this course deepened my understanding and love for chemistry. In addition, I feel very fulfilled in each course and can learn a lot of useful knowledge, which will bring good guidance for our future major choice.

narratives.question_text: The Canvas course site allowed me to identify and access required course materials easily.
